recipesJson.name: The Best Damm Strawberry Vape
recipesJson.author: MattyWill
recipesJson.description: This is definitely a super simplistic mix with flavors that everyone has. But just because something is simple doesn't mean it's not delicious. This recipe is the best strawberry vape you've ever had.

reviews.text: Excellent recipe. I enjoyed it as prescribed, but did end up adjusting it to bump up the Ripe. I posted a full review on reddit (https://www.reddit.com/r/DIY_eJuice/comments/93jkgl/review_of_the_best_damm_strawberry_from/). Thanks for this recipe, MattyWill. Awesome work.
